name: Rocky
dialogue: Hey! Rocky here. I'm excited for this concert!
I'm a big fan of Suzy. I'll make sure to be right at the front of the stage.

Guitar Pedal.tradeText: Wow you approached Suzy? How is she upfront? Thank you! Here's that pedal

name: Suzy
dialogue: We are going to nail this competition!
What's up? You want an autograph or something?

Autograph.tradeText: Here's that autograph! I did not write it out to anyone, hope that's okay.

name: Larry
dialogue: I can feel the beat flowing through me.
BA-DA-BOOM BA-DA-BOOM! How's my air-drum solo?

Drum Sticks.tradeText: They're not as good as my own, but a beginner like you could use them.

name: Friend
dialogue: I'm so glad you made it. Cheer for us out there!
I feel a little intimidated by the other musicians... but I know we're good, too.

VIP Ticket.tradeText: Here's the ticket I promised. You should be able to get into the VIP Lounge with it.

Key.tradeText: Here's the key to my dressing room. Please don't trash it...

name: Johnny
dialogue: We're soaring with business today thanks to this event. Hey, what can I get ya?
I've worked here a while, so I am very familiar with the venue. Ask me anything!

Saxophone Reed.tradeText: This one's brand new. I wouldn't give it to just anyone... but you're doing us a favor.

name: Security Guard
dialogue: Welcome. Please enjoy the show and be mindful of others.
You're here very early. You'll need a VIP ticket if you want to do anything.

name: Director
dialogue: I wonder if the instruments will be fixed in time...
Hi, I'm the Director of this venue. Hoping you can enjoy the show later today.
